title: Software Engineer
description: Build backend services and APIs; collaborate with cross-functional teams; write clean, testable code.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze data, build models, communicate insights; deploy ML pipelines.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop responsive UIs, optimize performance, ensure accessibility.

title: Backend Developer
description: Design microservices, manage databases, ensure reliability.

title: ML Engineer
description: Deploy and monitor ML models in production; MLOps best practices.

title: HR Recruiter
description: Source candidates, manage interviews, coordinate hiring.
